item.description:
This month is all about the number two and we are going to get in on it with some one-on-one action.  

Want to prove to your significant other who the better half is? Want to show your best friend who's boss?  Want to finally take down your personal gaming rival?  Well come join us as we have a day specifically for 2-player games.  This will be a daytime event in case things start to heat up and people want to leave at night for a private gaming session. ;-)

Bring your favorite game designed specifically for 2 players only and/or come see what others have brought so we can showcase some of the best games you can use to face off against another person.  This is an all genre event which means we will be featuring 2 players games that fall under any category (card, strategy, word, etc.) so come prepared to play anything.

Important note: You don't have to be part of a "pair" to sign up.  All are welcome.  And in fact, the rule for today is that if you come as a pair, you won't be allowed to play with each other.  Gotta try new experiences. ;-)

Hope to see you! :-)

 

----------------------------

This is a  Mini-Meetup. Anyone can sign up, but I would please ask that you  allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they are on the waiting list since there is limited seating.  Thanks. See this  discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "things that just go together".  Please bring a food item to share with the group that fits that theme.  Interpret that however you want, for example, strawberries and chocolate, chips and salsa, peanut butter and jelly etc..  I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location:  
This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Face-off
